page.title: 15LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
A survey which we carried out showed that by far the most popular pastime is watching television.Children at our school watch on average between 2 and 4 hours television each day.Only one person did not watch television regularly. Our square also offers the following: * a golf course -18 holes with a bar and restaurant. * a tennis club -2 courts * playing fields association -football,hockey,and cricket.
* a library -open 3 days per week * 3 public houses -(see page 17) * The Lynden Players -theatre group * Chenderit School is the venue of a variety of evening classes Also people travel to Banbury, Oxford and Northampton for entertainment.
